author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Memorable stream... A midnight drinking streaming. Kanpai :_きゅん: 🍹

The "drinking" word applies sometimes to Superchat reading, but Rushia added literally the drinking. :_ちょうちょ:

This is the adecuated encore for a great Super Saturday... When Supaachaato Orei Time of previous stream (Mario Kart 8 Deluxe) was interrupted for join Himemori Luna's Birthday.

And stream had not only zatsudan and drinking, also a bit of utawaku.
Later of first ending, she dedicated the Superchat reading, at the beginning she was so slow, but clearly she was recovering with time, but at same time it's notorious she's becoming more apassionated than before. :_ハート:

And again the heart raining at Superchat reading... Rushia is not only known at Japan, Overseas watch her and not only they broke the language barrier, Rushia broke that barrier too.
Lately Rushia is talking a more fluid english, and not only a simple english, also a bit more advanced words. :_るんるん:

2:15:00 Personal Mark :_ハート:
Even drunk she can pronounce well my Stage Name. :_ちょうちょ:
